Package adaa.analytics.rules.operator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassificationMetaCondition
    Class representing condition fulfilled by classification problems.
    ExpertRuleGenerator
    An ExpertRuleGenerator is an operator that extends RuleGenerator by providing user with the possibility to introduce users's knowledge to the rule induction process.
    RDataExampleSource
    Class representing example source to be utilized by R engine.
    RegressionMetaCondition
    Class representing condition fulfilled by regression problems.
    RuleGenerator
    The basic RuleKit learner operator.
    RulePerformanceEvaluator
    Operator performing evaluation of rule models produced by the RuleGenerator class.
    RulePerformanceEvaluator.CriterionClassWrapper
    Wrapper for performance criteria classes.
    RuleTranslator
    Class translating rules generated by RapidMiner SimpleRuleLearner (PRISM algorithm implementation) to RuleKit format.
    SurvivalMetaCondition
    Class representing condition fulfilled by survival problems.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RuleGenerator.MeasureDestination
    Auxiliary enumeration type describing possible destinations of quality measures.
